ygData.subject: Research Practice
ygData.msgSnippet: OK I ve started combining word into spells. I m hanging around a 2/3 success rate so far. I m lvl 20 & put all practice into it at lvl 20 that I could. I have
ygData.messageBody:
OK I've started combining word into spells.
I'm hanging around a 2/3 success rate so far.
I'm lvl 20 & put all practice into it at lvl 20 that I could.

I have a ton of words from a high lvl character I play.

Here is my question:
How can we make "practice words" or runes etc ?

A teammate told me to save the undead froglok tongues
from LGuk, and I could create practice runes with them ?
Then use the practice runes to help my research skill raise ?

OK
I have 60 undead frog tongues.
Now what ?
How to turn the tongues into a practice rune or word ?
Any other items that I can use to create "practice" stuff ?
Any website that explains this ?

Any further info on this is appreciated.
I hate to waste words.

Thank you
